name: Adidas Runners AR X RCB FAN ARMY Community Run
about:
Unite your passion for running and cricket with our AR x RCB Fan Army Community Run! This special collaboration between Adidas Runners (AR) and the RCB Fan Army brings together fitness enthusiasts and cricket fans for an energetic and fun-filled community run.

Who can join:
Open to everyone—whether you’re an AR member, RCB Fan, or simply someone who loves running in a community.

Run together, cheer louder, and celebrate the synergy of fitness and fandom. Join us for this unique and electrifying community event!

name: Adidas Runners Strength Training + Easy Run
about:
Enhance your running performance and recovery with our Strength + Easy Run session! This event combines targeted mobility exercises with a relaxed run to help you move better and feel stronger.

This session is suitable for runners of all levels looking to improve mobility, recover effectively, and enjoy a stress-free run.

name: Adidas Runners Speed Session
about:
Take your running to the next level with our Speed Session! This high-intensity workout is designed to improve your pace, power, and overall running efficiency.

Perfect for runners looking to challenge themselves and enhance their speed, whether training for a race or simply looking to push their limits.

name: Adidas Runners Fartlek run + Mobility
about:
Mix up your training with the dynamic combination of a Fartlek Run + Mobility session! This workout blends unstructured speed play with mobility exercises to improve your running efficiency, strength, and flexibility.

What to Expect:

Fartlek Run: A Swedish term meaning "speed play," this run alternates between periods of faster and slower paces, adding variety and fun to your workout while enhancing speed and endurance.
Mobility Drills: Post-run exercises focusing on improving joint flexibility, reducing muscle stiffness, and promoting a full range of motion.
Coaching Guidance: Tips on how to pace yourself during a fartlek and incorporate mobility into your regular training.

Who Can Join:
Perfect for runners of all levels seeking to boost their speed, endurance, and recovery with a playful yet effective workout.

Challenge your body, loosen up, and run free. Join us for this invigorating session that combines the best of both worlds!

name: Adidas Runners Easy Run + Yoga Session
about:
Refresh your mind and body with our Easy Run + Yoga Session! This event combines a relaxed run with a rejuvenating yoga session, offering the perfect balance of movement and mindfulness.

Perfect for runners of all levels, especially those looking to unwind, recover, and explore the benefits of yoga for their training.

Run easy, stretch deeply, and rejuvenate fully. Join us for this harmonious session to refresh your body and mind!

name: Adidas Runners Band Activation + Easy Run
about:
Get ready to enhance your running performance with our Band Activation + Easy Run session! This event combines targeted resistance band exercises with a relaxed run, perfect for strengthening muscles and improving mobility.

Open to all runners, whether you're new to running or looking to enhance your warm-up routine with effective activation techniques.

name: Adidas Runners Speed Session
about:
Take your running to the next level with our Speed Session! This high-intensity workout is designed to improve your pace, power, and overall running efficiency.

Perfect for runners looking to challenge themselves and enhance their speed, whether training for a race or simply looking to push their limits.

name: Adidas Runners WWWR - 5K run + Stretching
about:
Celebrate the spirit of community and empowerment with our With Women We Run (WWWR) - 5K Run + Stretching session! This global campaign encourages women to take strides toward their fitness goals in a supportive and inspiring environment.

This session is open to women of all running abilities. Come solo or bring a friend to experience the joy of running in a strong and encouraging community.

name: Adidas Runners Circuit Training + Easy Run
about:
Combine strength, endurance, and recovery in our Circuit Training + Easy Run session! This event blends functional strength exercises with a relaxed run, giving you a well-rounded workout to boost your performance and resilience.

Open to runners of all levels looking to enhance their strength and stamina in one dynamic session.

Strengthen, run, and recover—all in one session. Join us to elevate your training routine and have fun doing it!

name: Adidas Runners Speed Session
about:
Take your running to the next level with our Speed Session! This high-intensity workout is designed to improve your pace, power, and overall running efficiency.

Perfect for runners looking to challenge themselves and enhance their speed, whether training for a race or simply looking to push their limits.
